text.div:
guidanceRequirements

OPERATION: guidanceRequirements

The guidance requirements operation determines the data requirements for a given module or set of modules

URL: [base]/$guidance-requirements

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INmoduleIdentifier0..*Identifier

The identifiers of the modules for which data requirements should be retrieved

OUTresult1..1Basic

The aggregated data requirements for the requested modules

name: guidanceRequirements
description: The guidance requirements operation determines the data requirements for a given module or set of modules

parameter.name: moduleIdentifier
parameter.documentation: The identifiers of the modules for which data requirements should be retrieved

parameter.name: result
parameter.documentation: The aggregated data requirements for the requested modules
